description: Created to support developers serving Shopee sellers with different ecommerce needs, Shopee Open Platform is your go-to source of Open APIs and services.

main_features.name: Powerful APIs
main_features.description: Get access to a wide range of Open APIs with Shopee Open Platform, including those for orders, products, marketing and more. By tapping on Open API and push notification services released by Shopee, you can create customized software services to satisfy common seller needs such as order fulfillment, product optimization, shop promotion and more.

main_features.name: Comprehensive developer services
main_features.description: Enjoy end-to-end developer support at the stages of onboarding, APP development, APP testing, APP release, and APP maintenance. You can find tools for efficiency within the Shopee Open Platform to:
capabilities: Access Open API testing tools, test accounts and sandbox testing environments
Get important information such as the latest news (Announcement page), Open API articles (Documentation), answers to your queries (Support Center), and also search for articles.

user_types.description: We offer a comprehensive range of Open APIs that cover all of Shopee's key ecommerce processes for software businesses. By leveraging on Shopee Open Platform, you'll be able to deliver a variety of APPs to meet sellers' needs for shop operations, marketing, and more.

If you're a seller who wants to develop software tailored to your business needs, integrate your systems with Shopee's to discover untapped potential in the areas of operations optimization and data management.

notes: This appears to be an introduction/overview page of Shopee Open Platform documentation rather than a specific API endpoint documentation. It contains general information about the platform, its benefits, and who can access it.
